name: Empire
title: Cashing In
text:
Synopsis
Crypto executives are significantly monetizing their stock holdings, with Coinbase and MicroStrategy leaders among the top insider sellers, signaling potential strategic repositioning in the crypto market.

Key Insights
- Top crypto executives sold substantial amounts of company stock in 2024: Brian Armstrong (Coinbase) sold $636 million, Michael Saylor (MicroStrategy) sold $410.8 million
- Coinbase ranked 7th overall in insider selling, with $1.25 billion in stock sales
- Coinbase co-founder Fred Ehrsam sold $203.8 million through his trust and fund
- Coinbase COO Emilie Choi sold $186.4 million, outpacing earnings of JP Morgan and Apple/Alphabet CEOs
- Crypto-related developments include:
  - Altcoins currently outperforming Bitcoin
  - TRM Labs, Tron, and Tether formed a financial crime unit, freezing over $100 million in USDT
  - Terraform co-founder Do Kwon pleaded not guilty to fraud charges
  - IRS delayed proposed crypto broker accounting rules until 2026
  - Crypto M&A activity increasing, with FalconX acquiring Arbelos
